attributes.action: cancel the license fee for the bbc on the basis that they are performing advertising within programmes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC license fee has been enforced for it's duration on the basis that the corporation does not accept or perform any advertising during or within its programming.

During the US Masters this has obviously not been the case as the commentators have repeatedly made references to the sponsors of the coverage with statements such as 'The Masters sponsered by xxxxxx'.

This is in direct contravention of the license fee. 

Since the BBC are clearly raising funds from advertising the license fee should be removed.
